page.title: 02Home Life in Syston.
page.content:
{MY EARLY MORNING by a girl aged 10. { }When I wake up my Mum starts shouting me and I get up and go to the 'loo' (lavatory) and go downstairs. I hear the milkman and I eat some "Co-co Brek". I get dressed then my Mum puts my hair up. Next I have a wash and clean my teeth and pack my bag for school. I give my dog a hug and my Dad takes me to school in the car.
{EXTENSIONS TO HOUSES A survey of 30 houses built in 1973 showed that 17 had been extended.
Details of extensions: Bedroom {******** Downstairs {********* Bathroom {***** Kitchen {*** Garage {******
